messages.linkConflict: Name conflict: link or field with the same name already exists.

exceptions.manyToManyIsBlockedForRelationEntity: Many-to-Many relationship is not possible for entity of type Relation.
exceptions.oneToManyIsBlockedForRelationEntity: One-to-Many relationship is not possible for entity of type Relation

tooltips.clearDeletedAfterDays: Records for this entity are permanently deleted XX days after the deletion date.
tooltips.autoDeleteAfterDays: Updates of this field are logged in stream.
tooltips.dragAndDrop: This option activates hierarchy sort order, so no other sorting is possible in hierarchy navigation.
tooltips.unInheritedFields: Values for these fields will not be inherited from parent item.
tooltips.unInheritedRelations: Relations with these entities will not be inherited from parent item.
tooltips.hasAssignedUser: Show Assigned User in Access Management
tooltips.statusField: Updates of this field are logged in stream.
tooltips.disabled: Check if you don't need this entity in your system.
tooltips.linkAudited: Creating related record and linking with existing record will be logged in Stream.
tooltips.linkMultipleField: Link Multiple field provides a handy way to edit relations. Don't use it if you can have a large number of related records.
tooltips.modifiedExtendedRelations: Changes in these relations will cause the update of "Modified At" date and time.
tooltips.deleteWithoutConfirmation: If checked, the individual record is deleted without user confirmation. Deletion of multiple records is still  to be confirmed.
